channel.title: Animations +
channel.description:
does anyone know the animation number for... -thieving from a stall -fishing with a net -fishing with a lobster pot -fidhing with a harpoon
and does anyone know how to set cases for having a level requirment basically to make thieving stalls have a level requirment thanks

case 2562: { if (playerLevel[17] >= 55) { addSkillXP((60*playerLevel[17]), 17); addItem(995, 105000); startAnimation(0x340); sendMessage("You Steal From The Stall"); else if (playerLevel[17] <= 55) { sendMessage("You Need A Thieving Level Of 55 To Steal From This Stall!"); } } } break;

client.java:1867:'else' without 'if' else if playerLevel[17] <= 55 { ^ 1 errors press any key to continue...

pretty please help?
